subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A gaffe by Ryan Church, who completely missed tagging third base on his way home, canceled what would have been the go-ahead run for the Mets, who struggled with errors against the Dodgers.
snippet: A gaffe by Ryan Church, who completely missed tagging third base on his way home, canceled what would have been the go-ahead run for the Mets, who struggled with errors against the Dodgers.
